thing-type.label: ST812 Flood sensor
thing-type.description: Flood sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Flood Detector consists of a transceiver, flood sensor and 3-meter flood sensor cable. Protect your property from water damage! The Flood Detector is designed to sense the presence of water in basements, yachts and many others residential and commercial applications, providing early warning of developing floods. The Flood Detector is designed so that the transceiver is mounted on the wall and the flood sensor is placed in a location where water presence, such as a result of leakage or flooding, is probable. Upon flood detection, the Detector will beep and flash and report its status to the node ID. Once water is released, it will report to the node ID as well. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing link key three times within 1.5 second will enter inclusion mode.</p&gt <p&gtThe detector will stay “awake” for 10 minutes to allow time for setting and device status enquiring.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing link key three times within 1.5 second will enter exclusion mode.</p&gt <p&gtThe detector will stay “awake” for 10 minutes to allow time for setting and device status enquiring.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtNot provided</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Level Set
parameter.description: The value sent with Basic commands in case of detected flood<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 = Off</p&gt <p&gt1-99 = On (Binary Switch Device), Dim Level (Multilevel Switch Device)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Power applied and Sensor Alarm
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Detector will send ALARM_REPORT command to the nodes of Group 1 to inform the devices that the Detector is powered up.</p&gt <p&gtALARM_REPORT Command: [Command Class Alarm, Alarm Type = 0x02, Alarm Level = 0x01]</p&gt <p&gtThe second type for Group 1 is SENSOR_ALARM_REPORT. 255 = Alarm, 00 = Event clear.</p&gt <p&gtThe third type for Group 1 is ALARM_REPORT type 0x01, Low battery</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Device control
parameter.description: Group to send trigger value to<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWill send values of 0-99 to devices in Group 2. Set the value to send in Parameter 1.</p&gt
